  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, Clearable<InvisibleGUI>, Closable, IFluentObject<InvisibleGUI>, IRequestableContainer, Namable<InvisibleGUI>, Named, OptionalNamable<InvisibleGUI>, OptionalTokenable<InvisibleGUI>, Refreshable, Resettable, Tokenable<InvisibleGUI>, Tokened, Typed, TypeRequestable, Configurable, Specifiable, Specified, IElement, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class InvisibleGUI
extends GUI<InvisibleGUI>
    An invisble GUI is a GUI that is not visible.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
